page.title: 18Employment:
page.content: Most people in this area who need work have the opportunity to be employed locally.Many people interested in agriculture,can work close to home, either on their own farm,or on a near- by farm.Monkhouse's farm feed mill is probably the biggest employer in the village.It used to be a privately owned firm with the majority of employ ees being local.They used to build and buy houses in the village for workers. Some of these people had the opport- unity of buying their homes when a national company bought the mill.Birds is a locally owned poultry packing factory and frozen food shop. It processes locally reared poultry and employs workers from nearby villages. Hendersons own several wagons and employ local drivers for long distance haulage.The boardmill in the next village employs shift workers.
